SENT.plain: A case with pulmonary atresia/ventricular septal defect associated with port-wine stain and retinal vascular abnormality is reported
Clinical findings were similar to both PHACE syndrome and Sturge-Weber syndrome (SWS)
But, the most frequent and well-known features of both syndromes were absent
So, it could not be concluded whether this is a new constellation or an incomplete form of one of the two syndromes
In both situations, presence of a complex congenital heart disease that has not been reported previously makes this case original
